title: Protest in Lakhimpur Kheri after UP cop allegedly calls Sikh man ‘terrorist’
selftext: Shiromani Akali Dal and Samajwadi Party have accused the Uttar Pradesh police of insulting the Sikhs and demanded action against the police officer.
comments: Yadhaa Rajah tathaa prajah. The mofo at the top is a hate factory, little surprise at such things as these!! 🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️
UP have the most jaahil set of cops...even trumps the Delhi cops
